hero.headline: Hi, I'm
hero.bio: Full-Stack Developer · Passionate about learning and building. I create fast, user-friendly digital experiences with a focus on performance and simplicity.
hero.quote: Habits are the compound interest of self-improvement.

skills.itemString: Next.js React.js React Native TailwindCSS HTML CSS

projects.title: BP Log
projects.description: An AI-powered Android app for tracking blood pressure and pulse, offering personalized health insights and lifestyle tips based on the user's past records.
projects.tech: Expo React-Native Appwrite Node.js Deepseek LLM

projects.title: Pastel Notes
projects.description: A simple and secure notes app that lets you write, save, and organize your thoughts in one place. Log in to access your notes from any device, with fast performance and a clean, distraction-free interface.

projects.title: Smol URL
projects.description: A fast and simple URL shortener that lets you convert long links into short, shareable ones. Easy to use on any device with a clean, responsive design.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: Get real-time weather updates for any city with a clean, easy-to-use interface. This app works smoothly across all devices, giving you the latest weather info wherever you are.

about: A software engineer passionate about turning ideas into fast, functional, and beautiful web apps.

I like working on projects where I get to learn something new and solve real problems, whether it's on the frontend or backend. Clean design, smooth user experience, and writing code that's easy to understand — those are things I care about.
Outside of dev stuff, I'm usually exploring ideas, tweaking old projects, or reading about productivity, deep work, and creativity. Always trying to get a little better, one step at a time.

contact.message: I'm currently open to freelance work! Got a question or something else in mind? Just drop me a message.
